mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review ( content, review_score, review_img, member_id, item_id ) VALUES ( #{content}, #{reviewScore}, #{reviewImg}, #{memberId}, #{itemId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE review SET content = IFNULL( #{content}, content ), review_score = IFNULL( #{reviewScore}, review_score ), review_img = IFNULL( #{reviewImg}, review_img ) WHERE review_id = #{reviewId}
mapper.select: SELECT r.review_id, r.content, r.review_score, r.review_img, r.item_id, r.created_at, r.updated_at, m.nickname, m.profile_img FROM review r JOIN member m ON r.member_id = m.member_id WHERE item_id IN ( SELECT item_id FROM item WHERE item_group_id = #{itemGroupId} ) ORDER BY item_id DESC LIMIT (#{currentPage} -1) * #{pageSize}, #{pageSize}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM review WHERE item_id IN ( SELECT item_id FROM item WHERE item_group_id = #{itemGroupId} )
